BECOME A LEGEND

In 1274, the fearsome Mongolian Empire invades the island of Tsushima, wreaking havoc and conquering the local population. As one of the last surviving samurai, he rises from the ashes and goes beyond his traditions to forge a new form of struggle, that of the Phantom, while waging an unconventional war for the freedom of Japan.

MASTER THE BUSHIDO

Confront your enemies using the sword techniques that Jin Sakai can master. Unlock the posture of the stone, the wind, the water and the moon each style is designed for one type of enemy, and each has its own abilities.

EMBODY THE GHOST

When honour fails, use the Phantom techniques devised for stealth and special effects. Use Jin Sakai's skill to carry out devastating back attacks, bombings and subterfuge.
